cont.entity_a: Worst customer service and technical support with long wait times.

Router reboots every few hours and drops wireless connection about once per hour. Router frequently drops wireless connection and reboots itself. Frequent disconnections and reboots are unresolved by firmware upgrades. Not suitable for online gaming due to connectivity issues.
cont.entity_b: Router crashes occasionally, requiring multiple reboots. Router requires daily reboots due to software issues. Loses connectivity randomly.

cont.entity_a: Router cannot configure any wireless channel but 6.
Wireless link Indicator LEDs do not behave as described in manuals.
Advanced features are poorly described in the documentation.
Signal strength and quality are inconsistent. Strong signals throughout a two-story house with good speed. Signal range is poor beyond short distances.
cont.entity_b: Good range and handles multiple connections well when using DD-WRT software. Less range than older Netgear Wireless-G router. Wireless range is less than expected and connection drops frequently.

cont.entity_a: Easy to install with strong WPA security and good documentation. Easy to set up with simple installation instructions. Reliable for basic home use.
cont.entity_b: Setup is simple, but wireless storage feature has compatibility issues. Setup wizard does not work with Windows XP.

cont.entity_a: Compatible with VPN and works well with OS X.
cont.entity_b: Does not connect with wireless N enabled devices.

cont.entity_a: Firmware upgrades require complete shutdown and restart. Latest firmware upgrade causes issues with Xbox Live.
cont.entity_b: Discontinued product with no firmware support from Linksys. Somewhat buggy firmware with issues in NAT settings and wireless connection stability. Router works well with DD-WRT firmware, but standard firmware is unreliable.

cont.entity_a: Stable connection speed of 108Mbps with a Toshiba laptop using Atheros super-G wireless card. Good performance when set up manually, but problematic for novice users.
cont.entity_b: Router functions well as a gigabit switch after disabling wireless.
USB storage feature is limited and slow.
Easy to use management web interface.
